modalic.storage package#

Submodules#

modalic.storage.store module#

class modalic.storage.store.Storage(cfg)[source]#

Bases: object

Instantiate Storage Object that enables access to S3 layer.

cfg (dict): dictionary containing the configurations. client (minio.Minio): s3 client object.

create_bucket()[source]#

Instantiates and creates new bucket where all the object will be stored.

upload(object, object_name: str, length: int = - 1, metadata: Optional[Dict] = None)[source]#

Uploads data object to s3 storage bucket.
